content: *this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience * **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 90-150 yards #1 fingering weight 75% marino/25% nylon sock yarn by big sky yarn co in powder room rosewood bramble berry and razzleberry pie 3mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors stitch markers **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet 3dc cluster = dc3tog in same st bpsc = back post single_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces **additional terms ** working in the 3rd loop of half_double_crochet instructions look at the top of the stitch and locate the sideways v bend the stitch to look at the back and you should see another v made by the yarn over you ll be working into the back loop of that v this is called the 3rd loop **measurements ** newborn 5 1/2 x 5 0-3 mos 6 by 5 3-6 mos 6 1/2 by 6 12-18 mos 7 by 7 **gauge ** circle measures just over 4 across after round 9 **additional notes ** -chain-1 at beginning of row or round does not count as a stitch -when starting new row after fastening off make sure right side of bonnet is facing
